about_the_game:
This is a virtual multi-dimensional VR world. You can choose your own characters and equipment to take risks with your partners in the multi-dimensional world.



You can participate in the battle of the end of the day. Can you find the portal to go home from the end of the zombie infested world?



You can also guard the home core. The monster kingdom is sending troops to attack the game core and recruiting adventurers to guard it.



You can also give full play to your creativity on your own island and build your own seaside villa.



The ordinary difficulty of the game is suitable for normal games. After the game is over, it will be rated and rewarded according to the combat performance.

When you have advanced weapons, you can challenge the nightmare difficulty and get more game coins.



The game has a harsh death mechanism. If you die, your character will be reset and all the previously obtained game coins will be lost. Therefore, you must protect yourself when the game is out. If you can't hold on to the game, you can send it home at any time.

content_descriptors.notes: The game map has scenes where weapons are used to fight zombies or monsters.

detailed_description:
This is a virtual multi-dimensional VR world. You can choose your own characters and equipment to take risks with your partners in the multi-dimensional world.



You can participate in the battle of the end of the day. Can you find the portal to go home from the end of the zombie infested world?



You can also guard the home core. The monster kingdom is sending troops to attack the game core and recruiting adventurers to guard it.



You can also give full play to your creativity on your own island and build your own seaside villa.



The ordinary difficulty of the game is suitable for normal games. After the game is over, it will be rated and rewarded according to the combat performance.

When you have advanced weapons, you can challenge the nightmare difficulty and get more game coins.



The game has a harsh death mechanism. If you die, your character will be reset and all the previously obtained game coins will be lost. Therefore, you must protect yourself when the game is out. If you can't hold on to the game, you can send it home at any time.
name: 无限家园

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: The game is designed in the way of infinite flow, with weapons, maps and missions of various combat styles. The game has two operation modes: keyboard and mouse and VR. After the VR device is connected and restarted, it will automatically switch to VR mode.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
